questions.qText: If \( f(x) = \min\{ |x - 1|, |x - 2|, |x - 3| \} \), then the value of \( \int_{0}^{3} f(x) \, dx \) equals

Let \( f(x) = \frac{4x^2 - 3x + 1}{2x} \). If \( f\left(\frac{1}{2}\right) = \frac{p}{q\pi} \), with \( p, q \in \mathbb{N} \), then \( p - q \) equals \( \int_{0}^{1} \sin^4 t \, dt \)

Let \( \int x^2 \frac{d}{dx} \left( \frac{3x^2 + 1}{x^7 + 2x^5 + 2x^4 + x^3 + 2x^2 + 5x} \right) \, dx = f(x) - \tan^{-1}(g(x)) + c \), where \( c \) is a constant of integration, \( f(0) = 0 \), \( g(1) = \frac{3}{2} \), and \( h(g(x)) = x \ \forall x \in \mathbb{R} \)
If \( A = \int_{0}^{101} \lfloor x \rfloor \sin (\pi x) \, dx \), then find the value of \( \frac{A \pi}{2} \)

Let \( f \) be a twice differentiable function such that \( f''(t) = \int_{|2t|}^{1 + 6t^2} \ln \left( \frac{x + 8}{(t + 2)^2 - x} \right) \, dx \ \forall t \in \mathbb{R} \), and \( f(1) = 2f(2) = 2 \), then find the value of \( \int_{-1}^{1} f(x) \, dx \)
If \( \int_{0}^{\sqrt{2}} \frac{\pi \, dx}{2 (\cos^{-1} x)^2 \sqrt{1 - x^2}} = \frac{p}{q} \), where \( p \) and \( q \) are relatively prime, then find \( p + q \)

If \( \int e^x \left( \frac{1 - x^n}{1 - x} \right) \, dx = e^x \cdot P(x) + C \), where \( n \in \mathbb{N} \), \( C \) is a constant of integration, and \( P(0) = 620 \), then find the value of \( n \)
